title.narrative: Conflict Mediation in Post Earthquake Recovery

description.narrative: The Conflict Mediation in Post Earthquake Recovery supports Nepal's long term recovery following the devastating earthquake on 25 April 2015. The early recovery package of support will focus on three key themes: meeting the educational needs of vulnerable children, with a focus on girls and children with disabilities, as they transition back to school and “building back better” ; rebuilding livelihoods of women and other vulnerable populations; and rebuilding social cohesion, by ensuring there is access to alternative dispute resolution for addressing disaster-related conflict, violence and exploitation of women. Within the early recovery package, Australia provided funds to the Asia Foundation (TAF) in Nepal for a program to address conflicts and vulnerabilities related to earthquake recovery and assistance in Nepal.
